name: analyze_ciliary_beat_frequency
description: Analyze ciliary beat frequency from high-speed video microscopy data using FFT analysis.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: video_path
inputs.description: Path to the high-speed video microscopy file of ciliary beating

inputs.name: roi_count
inputs.description: Number of regions of interest to analyze

inputs.name: min_freq
inputs.description: Minimum frequency to consider in Hz

inputs.name: max_freq
inputs.description: Maximum frequency to consider in Hz

output.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results
